content.body: We pre-scan the source text to see if the word “group” appears anywhere, and if so, we do not install the method. Group is only accessible through computed property access were the key is not literally the string “group”.

maybe the engine need to record names that added to the array happens in Web

content.body:
> <@jridgewell:matrix.org> We pre-scan the source text to see if the word “group” appears anywhere, and if so, we do not install the method. Group is only accessible through computed property access were the key is not literally the string “group”.

and developers need to use it by `array["gro" + "up"]()` right
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @jridgewell:matrix.org
We pre-scan the source text to see if the word “group” appears anywhere, and if so, we do not install the method. Group is only accessible through computed property access were the key is not literally the string “group”.
and developers need to use it by array["gro" + "up"]() right
